name: The Split (hhmmhm)
description:
WHAT IS IT?

The Split is an online two player puzzle experience, designed during quarantine as a way to connect people over the internet. 

HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE?

approximately 10 minutes

HOW DO I PLAY?

The Split is designed for two players, on separate devices. You can play on IOS, but PC is preferred. One of you will host, and the other will join by entering the code provided by the host. You are not supposed to see each other's screen, so communication is essential. 

leave a comment if there is a bug, if you are stuck or if you have any feedback.
